image.caption: SimpleViewer is a free, customizable image gallery. Use it to display your images on any web page in a professional, intuitive and simple way.
SimpleViewer supports Universal Playback and can be viewed on Windows, Mac, Linux, iPhone, iPad and Android. Try it and see!
Easily create SimpleViewer galleries using svBuilder, our free desktop app.
SimpleViewer features intuitive image navigation, smart image pre-loading and a resizable interface that scales to fit the browser window (try resizing your browser).
Supports optional fullscreen mode and external image links via the Button Bar at top-right and the right-click menu.
This image use the linkURL attribute to link to a specific URL (use the arrow icon button at top-right to navigate).

Captions can be HTML formatted. Supported tags are bold, underline, italics, hyperlinks, linebreaks
and font tags
Handles images with different aspect ratios. Images can be tall or wide.
